thread.title: Farmers, GOP candidates express concern over trade tensions

title: Farmers, GOP candidates express concern over trade tensions
text:
Farmers, GOP candidates express concern over trade tensions Tuesday, April 10, 2018 - 02:19 
President Donald Trump on Monday said U.S. farmers will be protected during rising trade tensions between the United States and China, but Republicans running for office in America's heartland worry that tariffs could shake farmers' - and voters' - faith in the party.
